name: 1812: The Invasion of Canada
description: 1812 features fast, intuitive and fun gameplay that involves teamwork and strategic planning in a historic and educational setting. This is THE GAME for people who want an enjoyable and manageable introduction to historic/conflict based games.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities Storage: 650 MB available space
